@Joinedup_Data: Tomorrow is Open Data Standards Day at #IODC16. How we turn the principles of the Open Data Charter into practice?http://opendatacon.org/open-data-standards-day-from-principle-to-practice/ …

info:
Open Data Standards Day took place at Ifema North Convention Center on Wednesday, October 5, from 12:00 to 16:30 in Room A, as a pre-event for IODC16. The participants were Beata Lisowska, Brian Banks, Dan Mihaila, Steven Flower, Edafe Onerhime, Irum Maqsood, Greg Bloom, Hera Hussain, Jose L. Marin and Deirdre Lee.

This pre-event aimed to instruct about data standards by convening different sectors and organizations through seven lightning talks and three parallel sessions: “Metadata standards for open data”, “Global Beneficial Ownership Register”, and “Organization identifiers.”

session.description: The open standards day provided a space to discuss developing and implementing standards, among the projects covered were the Joined-up data standards thesaurus, water point data exchange and the Global Beneficial Ownership Register.

conference_notes: The conclusion stated that some challenges should be faced in the near future, as more and more experiences emerge to be replicated. Scalability and cooperation are key to solve these challenges, especially technological and policy-related ones.
name: Open Data Standards Day
